Articles.Content: 595: We need multiplayer where we can get Steam Achievements from killing aliens with weapons.
596: Add an underground facility on Kerbin somewhere, that has a rogue AI in it that loves testing
596.1: With a cake that may or may not actually exist.
597: Flying feathered unicorns which lick your command pod and turn it into sweets.

598: We shood beh abahl tah destroy planerts by shooting a lazer at them.

(It pains me horribly to type like that...Why do I do this to myself?)
We've got the next best thing... Mutated Sea Bass

599: I think their should be TV's so kerbals can watsh fairy odd parents

(I feel your pain, Mr. Rage)
600: Transform Kerbal Space Program into a space-themed FPS game (I'm looking at you PVZ: GW)

601: Maek teh planerts flat liek Starmade!

(gaaaah I feel like I must put a disclaimer that my actual typing isn't like that.)

602: Add bloks leik minecraft, minecraft is a fun game

602.5: BUTTER rockets which r rare

(Fun fact: Every time I type like this, a baby somewhere in the world starts crying)

603: Take the planets off their rails! Let their gravitational fields interact with each other, with barycentric coordinates and everything! Like when Eeloo comes on closest approach to Jool for instance hmmm?

(Surely this has been said already... I am too lazy to wade through 56 pages.
605. Frogs on the launchpad!

606: Make Kerbals randomly explode in the Command Module.

Edited September 13, 2013 by Sylandro

607: Make ship parts randomly explode after loading a quicksave.

Oh nevermind, that is already done! Thanks!
608: Make it so that engines have super laggy realistic exhaust!
609: Make it so that my 1970s PC can run 10,000 parts!
610: Match the slow loading time in the loading screen with matching SID or 4-bit music.

610: Match the slow loading time in the loading screen with matching SID or 4-bit music.

611: give us a minigame we can play while the game is loading (I think some games actually did that Oo)
612. Add gross incompetence to Kerbal mission control.
613: Give us a cannon for firing kerbals in to space/orbit plz
614: Add a fourth spatial dimension
615: Every once in a while, a sperm whale and bowl of petunias will fall from Duna orbit.
616. Add surfboards for kerbals.
617. Pls remove the map view, for realism. Instead using NAV and VOR and OMEGA radio beacons for navigation. thx
